comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edgar_Allan_Poe_Cottage "The decision to move [the cottage] was finally made in 1910 and on November 13, 1913, Poe Cottage in Poe Park was dedicated at the corner of Kingsbridge Road and the Grand Concourse.[8]" See also www.nycgovparks.org/sub_about/parks_divisions/historic_ho... and NYT of November 16, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9806E2DE103FE633A...
